name: inviZimals: The Lost Tribes
description:
Compatible with PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) and PlayStation®Vita systems.

The hunt is on! The magical world of the Invizimals is full of tiny creatures hiding all around. Set off on an adventure around the globe armed with your Invizimals™ trap and build your collection of mystical miniature beasts.
There are over 150 Invizimals hidden in the world around you and you’ll need to perfect your skills as a hunter to find them all. Every Invizimal that you find requires you to learn a new skill or complete a special task to catch them. No two Invizimals are the same and once you’ve caught them, you can customize them into a world-beating fighting force.
So, are you ready to join the hunt?

1 Player; Memory Stick Duo™ Compatible: 1.6GB minimum space required, Wireless Compatible (Ad Hoc Mode): 2 Players, Wireless Compatible (Infrastructure Mode): 2-16 Players


For wireless play on PSP system, this game may not be compatible with the UMD disc version of the game.

DISCLOSURE REGARDING USE OF LOCATION on PS Vita system: This game interacts with other applications that use location data (such as “near”). To turn off location data, go to [Settings] > [Location Data].

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated portable systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
